summary: Fixed React error #31 in BasicInformationForm.js by ensuring all helperText values are converted to strings. Changed helperText from 'condition && error' to 'condition && error ? String(error) : ""' to prevent rendering objects. Also removed unsupported onError prop from Popover components in previous fixes.
current_status: React error #31 fixed in BasicInformationForm helperText. All helperText values now safely converted to strings. Next.js rebuilt and restarted. Ready for testing Avatar click in header.
